languages.text: Один раз соблазнившись легкой наживой, вы предались греху пиратства и были пойманы за руку.
Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.
languages.original_text: Один раз соблазнившись легкой наживой, вы предались греху пиратства и были пойманы за руку.

traits.locale_text: Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gain got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.
Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gain got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.
Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.
Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.
Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.

languages.text: {mf|Tenté|Tentée} par l'argent facile, vous avez autrefois été {mf|pris|prise} en flagrant délit de piraterie.
languages.original_text: Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Tenté|Tentée} par l'argent facile, vous avez autrefois été {mf|pris|prise} en flagrant délit de piraterie.

languages.text: Hace tiempo, la tentación del dinero fácil te superó y te diste a la piratería. Te atraparon en el acto.
languages.original_text: Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.

traits.locale_text: Hace tiempo, la tentación del dinero fácil te superó y te diste a la piratería. Te atraparon en el acto.

languages.text: あなたは過去に一度、安易な利益の誘惑に負けて海賊行為に走り、現行犯逮捕されたことがある。
languages.original_text: Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.

traits.locale_text: あなたは過去に一度、安易な利益の誘惑に負けて海賊行為に走り、現行犯逮捕されたことがある。

languages.text: 很久以前，你被赚快钱的想法诱惑当起了海盗，结果被当场抓获。
languages.original_text: Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.

traits.locale_text: 很久以前，你被赚快钱的想法诱惑当起了海盗，结果被当场抓获。

languages.text: Als die Versuchung leicht erzielten Profits in deiner Vergangenheit einmal zu stark für dich wurde, hast du dich der Piraterie verschrieben und wurdest auf frischer Tat ertappt.
languages.original_text: Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.

traits.locale_text: Als die Versuchung leicht erzielten Profits in deiner Vergangenheit einmal zu stark für dich wurde, hast du dich der Piraterie verschrieben und wurdest auf frischer Tat ertappt.

languages.text: Geçmişinde bir kez kolay kazancın cazibesine kapılarak korsanlığa başvurdun ve suçüstü yakalandın.
languages.original_text: Once in your past, when the temptation of easy gains got the better of you, you resorted to piracy and were caught red-handed.
